posts.post_title: WTB: Low Grade Johnson, Young, Lajoie, Matty
posts.post_content: Looking for lower grades with decent eye appeal. Not too concerned with back damage. All poses except Young - glove showing and Johnson - hands at chest. Still looking for all Cobbs, too. Thanks!
